Version Update V1.2

  • Added AdvPostBP: You can now use this Blueprint (BP) to intuitively create advanced-looking Post data asset presets by rotating and lofting with splines. This can be used to change the appearance of Posts and Decorations.
  • Added Longitudinal Spacing Placement Mode for Decorations: You can now quickly place Decorations longitudinally at intervals.

Version Update V1.1

  • Vault Ceiling Feature: Now you can add vaulted ceilings to the stairs, allowing you to directly create sewer or dungeon passages.
  • Partition Wall Feature: Added the function to generate partition walls at the front or back of the passage.
  • Boolean Slot Function for Rails and Partition Walls: You can perform multiple boolean operations, such as simultaneously generating window holes, window frames, and window blueprints, which can be stored as data assets for reuse.
  • Head and Tail Rotation and Trimming Function: You can rotate and trim the head and tail to facilitate the connection with other stairs or buildings.
  • Decorations：Decorations are now in the post structure, so you can design your own decorations for each set of posts

Others:

  • Optimized the structure of Posts and Rails, now you can shield according to left and right or serial number range.
  • Updated the folder structure.
  • Updated some default materials.

Notices:

  1. New Assets Compatibility: Due to the update in structures, the new assets may not be compatible with previous versions. If you have used the old version in your project, please remember to back it up.
  2. Complex Boolean Slot Function: Extensive use of the complex boolean slot function may cause lag. It is recommended to use it at the end of your workflow.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


What is PMB-Quick Spline Stairs System?


Quick Spline Stairs System is a blueprint system that allows you to drag the spline to generate and modify stairs. When you design the presets and import them into the blueprint instance, you can quickly generate the stair BP. Be able to modify the shape, size, material of the various components of the staircase, and finally become the staircase you need.


Why use the Quick Spline Stairs System?


Stairs are needed in most projects, and the traditional stair making process needs to be completed in 3D software and then imported, or static grid art materials are used. But these don't necessarily match the needs of your project and waste time in the revision process. Quick Spline Stairs System is built modularized and programmed. After the template is made, you can easily adjust the parameters through splines and blueprints. In the project, you can modify and adjust in real time to match your project requirements.


Components included in the Quick Spline Stairs System:


The path is composed of platform and channel. The platform is generated at the spline point, and the platform shape is adjusted according to the spline Angle. The vertices are completely aligned, and the platforms are connected by channels.


Steps: Steps are generated on a passage that exceeds the step height and are classified as traditional steps, suspended steps (e.g. industrial stairs), and steps with a top step (e.g. domestic wooden stairs).


Railings: The railings are generated on both sides of the trail and can be adjusted into square or round pillars, or replaced with custom mesh.


Handrails: Handrails are seamless meshwork created along both sides of the walk, which can be used as traditional stair handrails, or can be offset to both sides of the step as slope decoration.


Decoration: Decoration is a decorative balustrade that is generated between two main balustrades. Multiple balustrades can be generated and adjusted to various angles, resulting in a variety of different styles and styles of stairs.


Other: There are piers, ceilings and other components that can generate and adjust styles.


Non-destructive workflow: The Stairs generated by the Quick Spline Stairs System can be used directly in your project, even during the initial phase of the project and the testing phase, and can be used as a basis for your project. Changes can be made very quickly just by dragging splines to adjust blueprints to expose variables only, and can be saved as data assets to reuse styles. Compared to traditional workflows made from other 3D software, it provides great convenience, saves a lot of time, and keeps your project under control.


Operation process

1. Create a style on the Quick Spline Stairs System instance BP and store the style to the data asset.

2. Import and drag the splines in the Quick Spline Stairs System instance BP in the map to make the stairs to match your project needs.

3, the data asset configuration to the Quick Spline Stairs System instance BP that is easy and simple to complete your stairs.

technicalDetails:
[Note: Need to open "Geometry Script" plugin]

Geometric functions and architectural principles: a large number of geometric functions, geometric vertex space position evaluation algorithm, combined with the principles of architecture, splicing construction of dynamic grid body formation, has a very practical reference significance.


Easy to understand blueprint: The main blueprint contains dozens of dynamic grid body construction of homemade functions, most of which contain annotations, clear and easy to understand, easy to reuse homemade modifications.


Better performance realization: The main building components are constructed by changing the position of the vertices of the dynamic mesh body with a low number of faces, achieving the overall low number of faces, even in the case of a large number of ultra-long custom stairs, the low number of faces is obtained, improving the performance.


Variable appearance: Railings, handrails and decorative parts can be added indefinitely, and the shape, material and position can be modified to rotate and offset the staircase into various appearance structures. The railings and decorative parts can also be replaced with custom mesh bodies.
